text:
Next month, we're releasing new cosmetics~!
We're offering trial samples~

Right now, you can try them out immediately~
We're also giving away trial samples of skincare products♡

Asahi-chan! They're the person in charge
on-site, come on, say hello properly──

No need to promote me to the person in charge!
I'll go talk to them over there!

Sorry...!
For not properly introducing myself...

No, no, it's fine.
You're a lively kid.

I'm really sorry...!
I'll make sure to apologize later...

No, no... That girl... Serizawa-san's approach,
is well-received by the customers too.

─You need to be as cute as possible, and make them want
to talk to you more... because we're idols, after all.

Asahi-chan,
you want to be liked by everyone too, right?

I think that's up to the other person's choice.
If they don't like you, then that's fine.

... "Fuyu!
Please take care of me today too!"
